Name: [The Silent Library]
Description: Data-Slates line silent shelves in this preserved archive. Pre-Glitch knowledge waits to be read - or lost forever. Emergency power keeps the temperature stable, protecting millennia of accumulated data from decay. The silence is absolute.
NarrativeText: This was a JÃ¶tun-Reader data repository - one of the vast libraries where the alien AI stored its collected knowledge. The data here spans civilizations, worlds, and time periods beyond human comprehension. But reading it comes at a price: your mind touching alien thought.
FlavorText: Rows upon rows of data storage crystals pulse with faint light. A reading terminal sits dormant, waiting. The air tastes like ozone. On one shelf, you notice a data-slate labeled in Old Aetheric: 'The truth of what we are'.
